text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom @realDonaldTrump, you need psychiatric intervention, NOW. You are your family vote by mail! You death mongering fool!  No one believes a word you say, even some of cult followers are doubting you. Just drop out now- off the planet.  PS hope covid-19 is fun!
